basics.label: Telephone Interviewer
basics.summary: Organized, task oriented professional with experience in customer support. Self-starter committed to taking ownership and capable of completing assigned projects independently and in a team environment.

work.name: National Agricultural Statistics Service
work.summary: Performs telephone interviews for a wide variety surveys and censuses. Obtains and records data on a survey instrument. Reviews information for completeness, edits and assists in the clerical processing of the collected information.
highlights: Migrated thousands documents into ECM (Enterprise Content Management System) in an effort to sunset legacy Intranet Server into a SharePoint environment.

work.name: Credit Control, LLC
work.summary: Handled customer questions, complaints, and billing inquiries. Skilled in resolving customer issues with one call resolution.
highlights: Proactively offered alternative solutions where appropriate with the objective of retaining customer's business.
Managed business transactions in connection with activation of new customer accounts on a computer terminal and communicate with customers.
Frequently made financial decisions to protect/collect revenues and adjusts customer accounts.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Securely acquired potential client information to establish new internet service.
highlights: Monitored and reported on sales activities and followed up for management.
Advised customers on forthcoming product, developments and discussed special promotions.

work.name: Walmart
work.summary: Received material into the store, prepared it for the store shelves, checked deliveries for accuracy.
highlights: Organized the stock room to ensure accurate labeling, logical placement, neat arrangement.
Cleanliness, decreased store shrinkage by researching inventory discrepancies, and reporting suspicious activities to loss prevention specialists.
